Other Information.Test Conditions: 0.2–100 mg/L in tangerine juice, 298 K, 1 bar
Other Information.Additional Info: Detection achieved through molecular sieve effect of ZIF-8 shell which excludes larger molecules from interfering with the SERS detection.
Used as a probe molecule to evaluate SERS performance; LOD was 6.56 × 10−10 M.

Sieving Mechanism: The microporous nature and extensive surface area of ZIF-8 selectively adsorbs target molecules while excluding larger interfering species.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: LOD for quinalphos: 10 ng/mL in tangerine samples; EF for malachite green: 3.15 × 10⁵; RSD: 14.6%

Other Information.Additional Info: Vacuum-dried L-AAZ exhibited enhanced adsorption capacity due to its rough and spiny surface, leading to significant increase in SERS intensity.
